casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS AND ADMINISTRATIVE ACTIONS

April 20, 2006

[Cite as 04/20/2006 Case Announcements, 2006-Ohio-1911.]

*1414MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2005-1966. In re A. B.

Summit App. No. 22659, 2005-Ohio-4936. This cause is pending before the court on the certification of a conflict involving parental rights or adoption from the Court of Appeals for Summit County. Upon consideration of the joint motion of amicus curiae Justice for Children Project and appellee Charles Brown for divided argument time,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion is granted, and the amicus curiae shall share the time allotted to appellee.
